User:Generate the lists of enumerations, classes and attributes from a given <Description>.
#Description 
The Team Sports Scouting System is used by various employees of the club, including the head coach, the director of the club and the scouts. It is the role of the head coach to identify designated player profiles for future signings, which includes designated target positions for a player (e.g. GK for goalkeeper, LB for left back, etc.), and other player attributes (identified by a name and a value).

Scouts may note players a long list who seem to match a designated target profile at any time. This long list is periodically evaluated by the head scout when setting up scouting assignments for his team to investigate a specific player more thoroughly. As the completion of a scouting assignment, the scout submits a scouting report about the player, which includes the pros and cons of the player as well as a recommendation (e.g. key player, first team player, reserve team player, prospective player, not a good signing). 

After comparing first scouting results for a designated player profile, the head coach and the head scout decide upon which players to move to the short list. Several other rounds of scouting can be carried out for each short-listed player as part of scouting assignments-some of which is carried out by the head scout himself. If a player is finally recommended for signing by the head scout, the director makes an official offer for the player.

AI:## Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition
   - GK
   - LB
   - ...

2. PlayerRecommendation
   - Key Player
   - First Team Player
   - Reserve Team Player
   - Prospective Player
   - Not a Good Signing

## Classes:
1. ClubEmployee
   - Attributes:
     - id: int
     - name: String

2. HeadCoach
   - Attributes:
     - designatedPlayerProfiles: List<PlayerPosition>

3. Scout
   - Attributes:
     - longList: List<Player>
     - scoutingAssignments: List<ScoutingAssignment>

4. Player
   - Attributes:
     - name: String
     - attributes: Map<String, String>

5. ScoutingAssignment
   - Attributes:
     - scout: Scout
     - player: Player
     - scoutingReport: ScoutingReport

6. ScoutingReport
   - Attributes:
     - pros: String
     - cons: String
     - recommendation: PlayerRecommendation

7. HeadScout
   - Attributes:
     - shortList: List<Player>

8. Director
   - Attributes:
     - officialOffer: Player

User:List all the classes and enumerations using format:
Enumerations:
1.enumeration(literals):[one-sentence rationale]
2.enumeration(literals):[one-sentence rationale]
...
Classes:
1.classname(attributeName1: attributeType1, attributeName2: attributeType2 ):[one-sentence rationale]
2.classname(attributeName1: attributeType1, attributeName2: attributeType2 ):[one-sentence rationale]
...

AI:Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition (GK, LB, ...): Represents the designated target positions for a player to be scouted.
2. PlayerRecommendation (Key Player, First Team Player, ...): Represents the recommendation for a player after scouting.

Classes:
1. ClubEmployee(id: int, name: String): Represents an employee of the club with an identifier and name.
2. HeadCoach(designatedPlayerProfiles: List<PlayerPosition>): Represents the head coach who identifies designated player profiles for signings.
3. Scout(longList: List<Player>, scoutingAssignments: List<ScoutingAssignment>): Represents a scout who maintains a long list of players and scouting assignments.
4. Player(name: String, attributes: Map<String, String>): Represents a player with a name and various attributes.
5. ScoutingAssignment(scout: Scout, player: Player, scoutingReport: ScoutingReport): Represents a scouting assignment linking a scout, player, and scouting report.
6. ScoutingReport(pros: String, cons: String, recommendation: PlayerRecommendation): Represents a scouting report with pros, cons, and a recommendation for a player.
7. HeadScout(shortList: List<Player>): Represents the head scout who maintains a short list of players.
8. Director(officialOffer: Player): Represents the director who makes an official offer for a player.

User:Generate the lists of enumerations, classes and attributes from a given <Description>.
#Description 
The Team Sports Scouting System is used by various employees of the club, including the head coach, the director of the club and the scouts. It is the role of the head coach to identify designated player profiles for future signings, which includes designated target positions for a player (e.g. GK for goalkeeper, LB for left back, etc.), and other player attributes (identified by a name and a value).

Scouts may note players a long list who seem to match a designated target profile at any time. This long list is periodically evaluated by the head scout when setting up scouting assignments for his team to investigate a specific player more thoroughly. As the completion of a scouting assignment, the scout submits a scouting report about the player, which includes the pros and cons of the player as well as a recommendation (e.g. key player, first team player, reserve team player, prospective player, not a good signing). 

After comparing first scouting results for a designated player profile, the head coach and the head scout decide upon which players to move to the short list. Several other rounds of scouting can be carried out for each short-listed player as part of scouting assignments-some of which is carried out by the head scout himself. If a player is finally recommended for signing by the head scout, the director makes an official offer for the player.

AI:Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition 
   - GK (Goalkeeper)
   - LB (Left Back)
   - CB (Center Back)
   - RB (Right Back)
   - CDM (Central Defensive Midfielder)
   - CM (Central Midfielder)
   - CAM (Attacking Midfielder)
   - LW (Left Winger)
   - RW (Right Winger)
   - ST (Striker)

2. PlayerRecommendation
   - Key Player
   - First Team Player
   - Reserve Team Player
   - Prospective Player
   - Not a Good Signing

Classes:
1. Employee
   - Attributes: 
     - role

2. HeadCoach
   - Inherits from Employee
   - Operations/Behaviors:
     - identifyDesignatedPlayerProfiles()

3. Director
   - Inherits from Employee
   - Operations/Behaviors:
     - makeOfficialOffer(player)

4. Scout
   - Inherits from Employee
   - Operations/Behaviors:
     - notePlayers()
     - evaluateLongList()
     - submitScoutingReport()

5. Player
   - Attributes:
     - name
     - value
     - position (PlayerPosition)
     - attributes (List of name-value pairs)

6. ScoutingAssignment
   - Attributes:
     - player (Player)
     - scout (Scout)
     - completionStatus

7. ScoutingReport
   - Attributes:
     - pros
     - cons
     - recommendation (PlayerRecommendation)

8. ShortList
   - Attributes:
     - players (List of Player)

9. OfficialOffer
   - Attributes:
     - player (Player)
     - director (Director)

10. HeadScout
    - Inherits from Scout
    - Operations/Behaviors:
      - setScoutingAssignments()

11. LongList
    - Attributes:
      - players (List of Player)

12. DesignatedPlayerProfile
    - Attributes:
      - position (PlayerPosition)
      - attributes (List of name-value pairs)

AI:Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition (GK, LB, CB, RB, CDM, CM, CAM, LW, RW, ST): Represents the different positions a player can play in a team.
2. PlayerRecommendation (Key Player, First Team Player, Reserve Team Player, Prospective Player, Not a Good Signing): Represents the recommendations for a player based on scouting reports.

Classes:
1. Employee(role: String): Represents an employee of the club with a specific role.
2. HeadCoach(role: String): Represents the head coach who identifies designated player profiles for future signings.
3. Director(role: String): Represents the director of the club who makes official offers for players.
4. Scout(role: String): Represents a scout who notes players, evaluates long lists, and submits scouting reports.
5. Player(name: String, value: String, position: PlayerPosition, attributes: List<Attribute>): Represents a player with a name, value, position, and additional attributes.
6. ScoutingAssignment(player: Player, scout: Scout, completionStatus: Boolean): Represents a scouting assignment for a player.
7. ScoutingReport(pros: String, cons: String, recommendation: PlayerRecommendation): Represents a scouting report with player evaluation and recommendation.
8. ShortList(players: List<Player>): Represents a shortlist of players selected for further evaluation.
9. OfficialOffer(player: Player, director: Director): Represents an official offer made by the director for a player.
10. HeadScout(role: String): Represents the head scout who sets scouting assignments for the team.
11. LongList(players: List<Player>): Represents a long list of players matching designated target profiles.
12. DesignatedPlayerProfile(position: PlayerPosition, attributes: List<Attribute>): Represents a designated player profile with a position and attributes.

AI:### Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition
   - GK (Goalkeeper)
   - LB (Left Back)
   - ...
   
2. PlayerAttribute
   - name
   - value

3. Recommendation
   - KeyPlayer
   - FirstTeamPlayer
   - ReserveTeamPlayer
   - ProspectivePlayer
   - NotAGoodSigning

### Classes:
1. TeamSportsScoutingSystem
   - employees (List<Employee>)
   - playerProfiles (List<PlayerProfile>)
   - scoutingAssignments (List<ScoutingAssignment>)
   - shortListedPlayers (List<Player>)
   - scoutingReports (List<ScoutingReport>)
   - makeOfficialOffer(player: Player)

2. Employee
   - role
   - name

3. HeadCoach
   - identifyPlayerProfiles()
   - designateTargetPositions(player: Player, positions: List<PlayerPosition>)
   - designatePlayerAttributes(player: Player, attributes: List<PlayerAttribute>)

4. Director
   - makeOfficialOffer(player: Player)

5. Scout
   - notePlayer(player: Player)
   - evaluateLongList()
   - setScoutingAssignments()
   - submitScoutingReport(player: Player, pros: List<String>, cons: List<String>, recommendation: Recommendation)

6. Player
   - name
   - position (PlayerPosition)
   - attributes (List<PlayerAttribute>)

7. PlayerProfile
   - player (Player)
   - targetPositions (List<PlayerPosition>)
   - targetAttributes (List<PlayerAttribute>)

8. ScoutingAssignment
   - scout (Scout)
   - player (Player)

9. ScoutingReport
   - player (Player)
   - pros (List<String>)
   - cons (List<String>)
   - recommendation (Recommendation)

AI:Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition (GK, LB, ...): Represents the designated target positions for a player to be scouted.
2. PlayerAttribute (name, value): Represents the attributes of a player identified by a name and a value.
3. Recommendation (KeyPlayer, FirstTeamPlayer, ...): Represents the recommendation for a player after scouting.

Classes:
1. TeamSportsScoutingSystem(employees: List<Employee>, playerProfiles: List<PlayerProfile>, scoutingAssignments: List<ScoutingAssignment>, shortListedPlayers: List<Player>, scoutingReports: List<ScoutingReport>): Represents the main system used by club employees for scouting players.
2. Employee(role, name): Represents an employee of the club with a specific role and name.
3. HeadCoach(): Represents the head coach with methods to identify player profiles and designate target positions and attributes for players.
4. Director(): Represents the director with a method to make an official offer for a player.
5. Scout(): Represents a scout with methods to note players, evaluate lists, set scouting assignments, and submit scouting reports.
6. Player(name, position: PlayerPosition, attributes: List<PlayerAttribute>): Represents a player with a name, position, and attributes.
7. PlayerProfile(player: Player, targetPositions: List<PlayerPosition>, targetAttributes: List<PlayerAttribute>): Represents a player profile with target positions and attributes.
8. ScoutingAssignment(scout: Scout, player: Player): Represents a scouting assignment with a scout and a player.
9. ScoutingReport(player: Player, pros: List<String>, cons: List<String>, recommendation: Recommendation): Represents a scouting report for a player with pros, cons, and a recommendation.

AI:Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition(GK, LB, CB, RB, CM, LM, RM, ST): Represents different positions that a player can play in.

Classes:
1. TeamSportsScoutingSystem(employees: List<Employee>, scoutingAssignments: List<ScoutingAssignment>): Represents the system used by the club for scouting players.
2. Employee(name: String, role: String): Represents an employee of the club.
3. HeadCoach(designatedPlayerProfiles: List<PlayerPosition>): Represents the head coach of the club.
4. Director(name: String): Represents the director of the club.
5. Scout(longList: List<Player>): Represents a scout who maintains a long list of potential players.
6. Player(name: String, attributes: Map<String, String>): Represents a player with various attributes.
7. ScoutingAssignment(scout: Scout, player: Player, scoutingRounds: List<ScoutingRound>): Represents an assignment given to a scout to scout a player.
8. ScoutingReport(pros: List<String>, cons: List<String>, recommendation: PlayerRecommendation): Represents the report generated by a scout about a player.
9. ScoutingRound(scout: Scout, player: Player): Represents a round of scouting conducted by a scout for a player.
10. ShortList(players: List<Player>): Represents a shortlist of players.
11. Offer(player: Player, director: Director): Represents an official offer made by the director for a player.

#Description 
The Team Sports Scouting System is used by various employees of the club, including the head coach, the director of the club and the scouts. It is the role of the head coach to identify designated player profiles for future signings, which includes designated target positions for a player (e.g. GK for goalkeeper, LB for left back, etc.), and other player attributes (identified by a name and a value).

Scouts may note players a long list who seem to match a designated target profile at any time. After comparing first scouting results for a designated player profile, the head coach and the head scout decide upon which players to move to the short list. AI:### Enumerations:
1. **PlayerPosition**  
   - GK (Goalkeeper)
   - LB (Left Back)
   - RB (Right Back)
   - CB (Center Back)
   - CM (Center Midfield)
   - LW (Left Wing)
   - RW (Right Wing)
   - ST (Striker)

2. **RecommendationType**
   - Key Player
   - First Team Player
   - Reserve Team Player
   - Prospective Player
   - Not a Good Signing

### Classes:
1. **Employee**
   - Attributes:
     - Name: String
     - Role: String

2. **HeadCoach**
   - Attributes:
     - DesignatedPlayerProfiles: List of PlayerPosition

3. **Scout**
   - Attributes:
     - LongList: List of Player
     - ScoutingAssignments: List of ScoutingAssignment

4. **Player**
   - Attributes:
     - Name: String
     - Attributes: List of PlayerAttribute

5. **PlayerAttribute**
   - Attributes:
     - Name: String
     - Value: String

6. **ScoutingAssignment**
   - Attributes:
     - Player: Player
     - ScoutingReport: ScoutingReport

7. **ScoutingReport**
   - Attributes:
     - Pros: String
     - Cons: String
     - Recommendation: RecommendationType

8. **ShortList**
   - Attributes:
     - Players: List of Player

9. **Director**
   - Attributes:
     - OfficialOffer: String

### Associations:
- HeadCoach has DesignatedPlayerProfiles.
- Scout creates LongList and ScoutingAssignments.
- ScoutingAssignment involves a Player and ScoutingReport.
- ScoutingReport includes Pros, Cons, and Recommendation.
- ShortList contains Players.
- Director makes an OfficialOffer.

AI:### Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition (GK, LB, RB, CB, CM, LW, RW, ST): Represents the positions a player can play in the team.
2. RecommendationType (Key Player, First Team Player, Reserve Team Player, Prospective Player, Not a Good Signing): Indicates the recommendation for a player signing.

### Classes:
1. Employee(Name: String, Role: String): Represents an employee of the club with a name and role.
2. HeadCoach(DesignatedPlayerProfiles: List of PlayerPosition): Manages designated player profiles for future signings.
3. Scout(LongList: List of Player, ScoutingAssignments: List of ScoutingAssignment): Notes players in the long list and creates scouting assignments.
4. Player(Name: String, Attributes: List of PlayerAttribute): Represents a player with a name and attributes.
5. PlayerAttribute(Name: String, Value: String): Represents an attribute of a player identified by a name and value.
6. ScoutingAssignment(Player: Player, ScoutingReport: ScoutingReport): Associates a player with a scouting report for a scouting assignment.
7. ScoutingReport(Pros: String, Cons: String, Recommendation: RecommendationType): Contains pros, cons, and recommendation for a player.
8. ShortList(Players: List of Player): Represents the short-listed players.
9. Director(OfficialOffer: String): Makes an official offer for a player.

User:Generate the lists of enumerations, classes and attributes from a given <Description>.
#Description 
The Team Sports Scouting System is used by various employees of the club, including the head coach, the director of the club and the scouts. It is the role of the head coach to identify designated player profiles for future signings, which includes designated target positions for a player (e.g. GK for goalkeeper, LB for left back, etc.), and other player attributes (identified by a name and a value).

Scouts may note players a long list who seem to match a designated target profile at any time. This long list is periodically evaluated by the head scout when setting up scouting assignments for his team to investigate a specific player more thoroughly. As the completion of a scouting assignment, the scout submits a scouting report about the player, which includes the pros and cons of the player as well as a recommendation (e.g. key player, first team player, reserve team player, prospective player, not a good signing). 

After comparing first scouting results for a designated player profile, the head coach and the head scout decide upon which players to move to the short list. Several other rounds of scouting can be carried out for each short-listed player as part of scouting assignments-some of which is carried out by the head scout himself. If a player is finally recommended for signing by the head scout, the director makes an official offer for the player.

10. ShortList(Players: List<Player>): Represents a short list of players for further consideration.

AI:Enumerations:
1. PlayerPosition(GK, LB, ...): Represents the designated positions for a player in the team sports scouting system.
2. PlayerAttribute(name, value): Represents the attributes of a player identified by a name and a value.

Classes:
1. Employee(role: Role): Represents an employee in the club with a specific role.
2. HeadCoach(designatedPlayerProfiles: List<PlayerPosition>): Represents the head coach who identifies designated player profiles for future signings.
3. Director(): Represents the director who makes official offers for players.
4. Scout(longList: List<Player>, scoutingAssignments: List<ScoutingAssignment>): Represents a scout who maintains a long list of players and scouting assignments.
5. ScoutingAssignment(scout: Scout, player: Player, scoutingReport: ScoutingReport): Represents a scouting assignment for a player by a scout.
6. ScoutingReport(pros: String, cons: String, recommendation: Recommendation): Represents a scouting report for a player including pros, cons, and recommendation.
7. ShortList(players: List<Player>): Represents a short list of players.
8. Player(name: String, attributes: List<PlayerAttribute>, shortListed: boolean): Represents a player with attributes and shortlisted status.
9. HeadScout(): Represents the head scout who evaluates long lists, moves players to short lists, and carries out scouting assignments.
10. Club(employees: List<Employee>, scoutingSystem: TeamSportsScoutingSystem): Represents a club with employees and a team sports scouting system.
11. TeamSportsScoutingSystem(shortList: ShortList, headCoach: HeadCoach, headScout: HeadScout, director: Director): Represents the team sports scouting system with key components.
